channel.title: Behavior Driven Development (BDD) on Shubham Singh
channel.description: Recent content in Behavior Driven Development (BDD) on Shubham Singh

item.title: My journey from a CNCF contributor to LFX mentee
item.description: Contributing to open source, specially to the Cloud Native Community Foundation (CNCF) has been one of the most effective ways for me to learn programming, understand how large codebases work and work with experienced engineers on large scale projects. It’s been a year for me as a contributor in the CNCF ecosystem and I also have recently completed my LFX (Linux Foundation Mentorship) program as a mentee. As I wrap up my LFX program I want to share my journey in open source - from contributing to CNCF projects to getting into the prestigious LFX (Linux Foundation Mentorship) program and completing it successfully.
